stem: Зачем учитывать bend allowance когда laying out bent parts?

stem: Когда laying out a bolt circle without a CNC, a good approach is to:

stem: Зачем использовать a center punch during layout?

rationales.CHOICE-2: Punch marks help keep locations visible and guide drill points.

stem: Какой из следующих подходов верен when choosing a layout датум?

From the same датум(s) each time

stem: Почему важно cutting пропил (kerf) be accounted for in layout?

choices.text: Kerf adds material back to the part
It удаляет material; planning preserves final dimensions
It only matters for plasma cutting
Layout lines are unaffected by пропил (kerf)

rationales.CHOICE-2: The cut удаляет stock; offsetting cut lines maintains required size.

stem: Перед cutting parts from a plate, a good layout sequence is to:

choices.text: Cut first, then decide where features go
Nest parts to minimize scrap, mark all, then cut
Draw one part and cut immediately

rationales.CHOICE-2: Nesting уменьшает scrap and errors before cutting.

stem: Чтобы избежать losing layout marks during cutting/grinding, you should:

rationales.CHOICE-2: Protect/refresh marks to keep references intact.

stem: Когда using a scribe on finished surfaces, you should:

Никогда use tape or paint markers

stem: Для точности, a steel rule should be read:

choices.text: By estimating to the nearest centimeter

rationales.CHOICE-2: Reading to the smallest graduation уменьшает measurement error.

stem: Как следует precision layout tools be stored?

stem: Какой способ helps transfer equal measurements accurately?

Use chalk and estimate by eye
Wave a hand near the part

rationales.CHOICE-1: Dividers and squares allow precise transfer of repeated distances.
